isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 5.1: DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - FLUKE 88 DIGITAL MULTIMETER (ZTSE-4357)

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para:
The Fluke 88 multimeter (ZTSE-4357) (Figure 5.16)
allows the technician to troubleshoot the electrical components (sensors, injector solenoids, relays, wiring harnesses etc.) associated with the T 444E Diesel Engine. In addition, it measures engine RPM. This feature allows the technician to measure engine cranking RPM when the Electronic Service Tool (EST) is not available or is unable to receive ATA data. This meter has a high input impedance which allows testing of sensors while the engine is running, without loading the circuit which is being tested. This ensures the signal voltage measurement will not be affected by the voltmeter.
